Question: Codemind Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Codemind Corporation

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- New AI-powered smart home security system
- Enhanced facial recognition technology
- Integration with voice assistants for hands-free control
- 24/7 monitoring and alerts for added security
- Easy installation and setup for user convenience
